subject: Can I capture Stdandard Output of a test
msgSnippet: How can I capture the standard output of test?  I need to check that the messages from the class I m testing are correct.  For example if my class class calls
messageBody:
How can I capture the standard output of test? I need to check that the messages from the class I'm testing are correct. For example if my class class calls a parser that print "invalid input at line xx" when it fails, I want to be able go catch that output and compare it to the expected value. If it could be directed to a file on a per-test basis, I could do a diff to check it.

Any suggestions would be appreciated.

Thanks,

Jim Cant
